Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to increasing membership on the New York city transit authority advisory council
Summary: Increases membership on the New York city transit authority advisory council to seventeen, adding a member appointed upon the recommendation of the council of "LiveOn NY".
LawCode: Amd ยง1204-e, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to membership on the New York city transit authority advisory council
